strapiPost.title: #NWAChampionship Week Tickets On Sale Now
strapiPost.content:
The Walmart NW Arkansas Championship, presented by P&G, returns Sep 23 – Oct 1 to Pinnacle Country Club, bringing an exciting week of events to the region.

On the Run: The #NWAChampionship Week will once again feature a variety of community-driven events and experiences, including the 5k @ the LPGA benefiting Mercy and an enhanced onsite area for families — the Walmart and P&G Kids Confidence Club.

Razorback Red: Tournament officials are thrilled to announce that the field will include a robust lineup of current and former Arkansas Razorback student-athletes, including Brooke Matthews and Miriam Ayora, who both have received exemptions to compete in the event.

Tournament tickets and the full schedule of events are available at NWAChampionship.com.
